Roa

Korean: 로아

Hometown:

Dongan-gu, Anyang-si, Gyeonggi-do

Country:

South Korea

Full name:
Kim Ga-yeon
Native name:
김가연
Birthday:
Oct 28, 2009
Age:
15 years old
Group (2025-present):
USPEER

Introduction

Roa is a South Korean trainee under WM Entertainment.

On April 3, 2025, she was revealed as the fourth member of WM Entertainment's upcoming girl group USPEER.

WM Entertainment:
Jan 1, 2025-present

active

2025-present

Fun facts

1
Roa has a four-leaf clover keyring attached to her phone. Soee is the one that bought it for her on her birthday.
…
2
Roa, Soee, and Sian are roommates.
…
3
According to ONF's U, Roa is the MVP of USPEER's 'ParadoXXX Invasion' dance cover because she is really flexible and stood out a lot.
…
4
According to the members, Roa is in charge of being USPEER's hot girl.
…

Roa's sport is tennis.
…

…

Roa's strength is that she has an emotive voice.

…
10
Roa's introduction in 'RUN UP!' was "she's the youngest of the group that will even laugh at a fallen leaf, but her charm lies in her sincerity and unexpected charisma on stage".
